item.title: CV
item.description: Current Occupiation Ph.D. student and Research Associate, Institute of Software Security, Hamburg University of Technology, Germany. Work Experiences Year Description 03.2021 - now Research Associate at Hamburg University of Technology. - Research about automated repair for software vulnerabilities. - Teaching courses: Software Security, Secure Software Engineering, IIW Praktikum. 08.2018 - 02.2021 Research Assistant/Teaching Assistant at Vietnam National University, Hanoi. - Research about Change Impact Analysis for JavaEE and Struts, Parallelization Suggestion for Automotive Software, Lightweight Program Analysis for Grading OOP Exercises.

To Appear. 2022 [ISSTA'22] Maestro: A Platform for Benchmarking Automatic Program Repair Tools on Software Vulnerabilities. Eduard Pinconschi, Quang-Cuong Bui, Rui Abreu, Pedro AdÃ£o, Riccardo Scandariato. The 31st International Symposium on Software Testing and Analysis, 2022. (PDF | Code) [MSR'22] Vul4J: A Dataset of Reproducible Java Vulnerabilities Geared Towards the Study of Program Repair Techniques.

item.title: TODOs
item.description: This page is kinda a “secret” place where I write down and track my daily/long-term tasks. Congratulations if you luckily found it! :). To-Do tasks The following is my bucket list for my side tasks/projects. Todo 07/2023: Write an App for my groceries, publish it to the stores if possible 04/2023: Learn Data Engineering Zoomcamp 05/2023: Learn Machine Learning, fundamental course Waiting for new course of Andrew Ng :) The course with three modules are available now (08/2022) 2022: Learn Haskell [Regularly]: Practice Problem Solving (to freshen my mind) Pending 05/2022: PA CMU course Done âœ“ 07/2021: Get fully vaccinated 06/09/2021: Complete Coursera SoftSec course 09/12/2021: Get my residence permit (really exhausted journey in Germany) 07/2022: Komplett Deutsch A1.
